modName: Tera Mod Collection Made By Me
descriptionHtml:
Tera Mod Collection
Warning! Image Heavy! Those with slow connections beware!

Please Do Not UPLOAD these mods to Skyrim Nexus! For your own sake. Don\'t get upset when they moderate then delete your file by uploading the mods here to Skyrim Nexus...

*I DID NOT* make these mods or files unless *STATED*.
All mods & credit goes to their respective original authors.
Thx to all the people in loverslab.com who share the files.

To those who do retexture work & want it added in the list, i would like you to include a screenshot in the zip/rar/7z file with a width of 850 pixels wide max, thank you in advance.

Updates for 07 May ~ 13 May 2012
Show ConentSpoiler:
Decided to compile a list of Tera related mods for Skyrim and here goes:

Armor names will be refering to http://tera-online.cc

All Mods are non replacers unless specified.
Replace first 2 number with your load order for IDs for example:

Castanic female H02 which mine is 31000d65.
So yours might be 29000d65 or 01000d65, so change accordingly.

You can also type (help \"name of item\" 4) in console.

Examples of help command:
help elin 4
help L03 4
help \"heavy 4\" 4

Examples of player.additem command:
player.additem 13963 1
player.additem 2d008030 1

Remember, use Page Up & Page Down keys on your keyboard to scroll up and down in console.

Lastly, check if you have the smithing perks for it when you cannot find the item(s) in the forge menu.

Those armor that need BBP or Skeleton please go to Essentials & Misc section for links. If you don\'t have it, you\'ll crash to desktop. Simple as that.
